approaches.title: String Iteration with Dictionary
approaches.blurb: Iterate over the sentence to filter out punctuation and sum word counts with a dict.

approaches.title: String Replace with Dictionary
approaches.blurb: Use str.replace and str.strip to filter out punctuation and sum word counts with a dict.

approaches.title: String Replace with Comprehensions
approaches.blurb: Use str.replace and str.strip to filter out punctuation and sum word counts with comprehensions.

approaches.title: String Replace with Collections
approaches.blurb: Use str.replace and str.strip to filter out punctuation and let collections.Counter do the rest.

approaches.title: Using the Re Module
approaches.blurb: Python's Re module is both versatile and powerful.

approaches.title: String Translate with Counter
approaches.blurb: Use str.translate to filter out punctuation and then tally words with collections.Counter.

approaches.title: Filter with Counter
approaches.blurb: Use the built-in filter function to clean the sentence and collections.Counter to count the words.
